item.title: FORRT presentation @ Open Science Day at Goethe University
item.description:
The Frankfurt Open Science Initiative organized an Open Science Day in Frankfurt at Goethe University whose theme revolved around Open Science and Teaching.

FORRT was featured as one of the two main talks, and below you find the recording of FORRT‚Äôs presentation.

For an aper√ßu of the whole event, see this Twiter thead.

Exactly two weeks ago, we had our Open Science Day & talked about #OpenScience in Teaching. We are still super impressed/inspired/amazed/... üòç The whole event was a full success! üéâ And we are really happy that we recorded the talks & can now share them!
